      • generateSchedule

        public boolean generateSchedule(java.util.ArrayList<Module> modules,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms,
                       int examPeriodLength)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        algorithm of the program
        Parameters:
        modules - Arraylist of all modules to be scheduled
        rooms - Arraylist of all rooms to be scheduled
        examPeriodLength - the numberOfdays which the exams can be schedule in
        Returns:
        boolean True if generated succesfully, false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getScheduledModules

        public java.util.ArrayList<Module> getScheduledModules()
                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns scheduled modules. Note, this MUST be ran after generate schedule.
        Returns:
        Arraylist of the scheduled modules
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not ran after a schedule has been generated.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • generateAndReturnSchedule

        public java.util.ArrayList<Module> generateAndReturnSchedule(java.util.ArrayList<Module> modules,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms,
                                                    int examPeriodLength)
                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates a schedule and returns the now scheduled modules
        Parameters:
        modules - Arraylist of all modules to be scheduled
        rooms - Arraylist of all rooms to be scheduled
        examPeriodLength - the numberOfdays which the exams can be schedule in
        Returns:
        Arraylist of the scheduled module
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if schedule could not be generated.

      • manageDupicateModules

        public java.util.ArrayList<Module> manageDupicateModules(java.util.ArrayList<Module> modules)
        bundles clashed modules together, to allow them to be ran at same time.
        Parameters:
        modules - Arraylist of all modules to be scheduled
        Returns:
        sorted ArrayList of all modules, with clashed modules organised together as Super modules
